messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] DC area
messages.messageBody:
>From: "Shyrley" <shyrley.williams@...>

<<Ta muchly. I'm crouching behind my car when I put gas in it and
dodging and weaving across the car lot at the store...

Most people here seem pretty freaked out and my kids want to go
back to the UK :-(>>


I have a cousin in Arlington and there are actually people calling out to
others who are in the open to take cover. It's really sad. I can't imagine
that kind of fear. It seems to me even worse than agter 9/11. I mean you
just know someone in that area will be a victim again. Take care and comfort
those poor kids.

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] DC area
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ta muchly. I m crouching behind my car when I put gas in it and dodging and weaving across the car lot at the store... Most people here seem pretty freaked
messages.messageBody:
On 13 Oct 02, at 1:39, Mary Bianco wrote:

>
> If we have anyone in the VA and MD area, I just wanted to wish you
> health and to say be safe. Please be careful until this nightmare is
> over.
>
> Mary B
>
Ta muchly. I'm crouching behind my car when I put gas in it and
dodging and weaving across the car lot at the store...

Most people here seem pretty freaked out and my kids want to go
back to the UK :-(

Shyrley in north Virginia


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: DC area
